name: Antone Brier
text: The Mellow Mushroom was wonderful! There was a live band, the bartender was friendly, and, best of all, the pizza was great!!

name: Lindsay Beard
text: Best one I've been to so far for the roof top eating experience, u have to check them out.  Food ans drinks are amazing

name: Bryan White
text: Love music .way to loud .....we sat up on roof top...ok ordered pitcher tap was put up top....got cans and bottles. With cups of ice .ordered the small pizza dry ...listen do not go too top.they do not want to get sauce. utensils. Parmesan..not really a good mellow mushroom.

name: Rachel Freeman
text: Good pizza and lively atmosphere! A little loud if you're sitting downstairs and there's a band playing but still a fun little place to stop in!

name: Robert McCain
text: Waited over 30 minutes for picukup from when they said pizza would be ready in COVID  sesspool

name: Sarah Jones
text: Both bands were great!  They definitely fed off the energy of the room and played to everyone's taste.  Food was fantastic too!  Zach, our server was so wonderful!  We were reluctant to go here at first because we didn't want to go to "a pizza place," but it was the best food we had in Nashville and ended up being soo much fun!

name: Anthony Hall
text: Would give 5 stars, but the band, although great, was too loud to conversate over.

name: Michael Bamrick
text: Great location downtown and a fun spot to hang out at. We sat on the rooftop for lunch but there were 4 floors in total to choose from. The pretzel bites are a must. Food otherwise was average and on the smaller side portion wise. It did take a long time to receive our food so don’t go if you are in a rush.

name: Sara Fry
text:
Was my first time eating at a MM. The food was great and the service fantastic!

Shout out to the staff on 6/6/2020 @ 2pm. With the events of the weekend the …More

name: Janelle Thies
text: Great service.  Tried the bruschetta and trio meatballs.  Bruschetta was good but over priced for 5 small pieces.  Meatballs were delicious.

name: Tanya Eilders
text: We got the club sandwich and it’s nothing special. It was supposed to be on wheat bread with an avocado smash. It came out on a hoagie bun with no smash. Told waitress and she said she would get the avocado for us. Came out with sliced …More

name: Clay Davis
text: We came here for lunch immediately after we landed.  Great comfort food and really good vibe with live music.

name: Cyndy Gryczewski
text: Live music.  Great Magic Mushroom soup.  Frozen Jack & Coke are delicious but expensive.  Shocked when we got our bill and a small was $11.00.

name: Heather Stoddard
text: Awesome place highly recommend! Food was fantastic and the music was perfect. On top of that our server, Ashton, was amazing. Super attentive and friendly. Best place we've been in Nashville for drinks and a bite to eat.

name: Jennifer Grimes
text: The band that was there on Sat Sept 26, 2020 around 4 5 o'clock was awesome sorry didn't catch the name

name: Jonathan Orellana
text: Loved the Jack and Coke slushie here and the pizza was great! Also they have live music. They didn't have any soap in the bathroom but the servers said that they would refill it soon after.

name: Jennifer Brown
text: Fun location. Great waitstaff.  Jillian was amazing!!

name: Brianna McCabe
text: Really tasty pizza, great service.  We really enjoyed ourselves!

name: Lizbelle Cruz
text: The pizza here is sooo good. My kids loved it!

name: Thomas Caywood
text: Very good pizza, wings, and cheesy garlic bread.   The server took excellent service of our 9 person(2 toddlers) while tending bar.  The manager was also keeping our kids entertained.  It was an amazing experience!!

name: Savannah Jade
text: I love mellow in Nashville its my go too🤣

name: Diane Brittingham
text: Fabulous night filled with great music, an attentive bartender, friendly patrons equal a Fabulous  might in Nashville @

name: Brenda Mercado
text: Pizza was great . Loved the live music!

name: Cindy Stevens
text: Great place..great service ..pizza we awesome

name: David Bradshaw
text: Have ordered from them twice through Postmates. Both times stated that we are vegan and need any non-vegan ingredient left off of the pizza. We built our own pizza, using their vegan cheese option and only using the veggies option. Both …More

name: Rae Rae
text: Great place to hangout! Delicious food and great drinks. Get a frozen Jack and Coke they are so good. Roof top patio is awesome. …More

name: Nathan Bell
text: Loved this place. The food, staff and music was amazing.

name: Barry Douglas
text: Veggie pizza -  good but the crust was too salty and too thick. Not enough sauce and veggies for me. But this place has a great atmosphere and warm efficient staff. Great live music

name: Lauren Barbella
text: I’m a New Yorker and I thought their pizza was awesome. Drinks were good and decently priced. Their menu has a lot of options.

name: Dan C
text: Great music, good pizza, crowded but social distancing well... Highly recommended...

name: Adam Zwick
text: Pretty refreshing to dip into this bar after running the strip for some delicious pizza, nice little atmosphere with a stage and great service. At the time I was sitting at the bar and the bartender was getting visibly frustrated with the …More

name: Beth Tuck
text: Great pizza just hard to pick up to go orders downtown.

name: Reggie Zeigler
text: A1 experience, and the band was great!

name: Jaquon&Novia Jackson Chronicles
text: Great service and experience with live music by Ms Kaylee Rose, simply amazing over all experience, and the food was so so delicious. Thank you all

name: jeff Stollwerck
text: Great pizza, great beer, intimate

name: Thomas Rains
text: Good food. Good music. Good people.

name: Jaci Gianella
text: Awesome! Great food, great atmosphere, great service!

name: Sombers Garrison
text: We are from out of town, what a great experience. The place was very busy but they made it a point to acknowledge that and even the owner came over and spoke with us. He not only encouraged us to visit the immediate area but all over Nashville. He was proud be part of this community. Everyone was friendly and the music was great!

name: Joann Cook
text: Great music. The food was great. Fast service.

name: Mary Brown
text: Such fun and great entertainment!

name: Christina Perez
text: We came in not many people in here just a few tables ordered our food took about 15-20 minutes for our one large pizza which was good maybe would be nice to have a cover to keep in the heat since it is chilly now outside that comes inside. …More

name: Mark Maizonnasse
text: Good food good spot. Fair service

name: Jerry Fuhrer
text: Very good pizza, wings, and cheesy garlic bread.   The server took excellent service of our 9 person (2 toddlers) while tending bar.  The manager was also keeping our kids entertained.  It was an amazing experience!!

name: Shane Alberts
text: Wanting pizza really bad. This place is the ticket. Upstairs balcony, pizza was really good, sights were great, and I CANNOT SAY ENOUGH ABOUT FEN, Our bartender. He was EXTREMELY AWESOME, and friendly, remembered our names and made it a point to do that. Highly recommend you pay a visit.

name: Martin Mesecke
text: Nice beer selection.great pizza and good entertainment. Not a kiddy college bar.  Great place to stop and grab something to eat.

name: Jennylyn Pace
text: We came to eat at Mellow Mushroom on a moderately busy Sunday night. The service was great & the pizza was even better. We got the meaty pizza with jalapenos. Usually, I don't eat the crust because it's wasted/empty calories, but the dough …More

name: Faith Hennessee
text: I had a great time last night at mellow mushroom with Rebecca at the bar and the John cage band. Had so much fun might as well share on both pages. She is energetic and fun she brought the whole bar together as a big family. We had a blast …More

name: SheBeast LaceyUnderwood
text: Best band played that day that I've heard in a long time.  Good service,  hot fresh pizza. Trophy girl standing outside to invite you in, so it didnt have a pizza place feel, more like bar grill.  Fun atmosphere.

name: Jachian Wong
text: Their pizza seems like made from scratch since it has the uneven crispy edge. Actually I personally like this way. And their drink is nice especially sunset in paradise and blue moon rising.

name: Cobra Fan
text: I had 2 different experiences here. The first time it was very good. The service, food, drinks, and music were all great. The 2nd time we came back later at night. I knew to expect it to be busy, and the service was fine. My biggest …More

name: Melanie Hathaway
text: We had the best service with Rebecca at Mellow Mushroom! She made our one requested song happen! Taryn Papa is the best singer I’ve heard in downtown Nashville since the Northern Lights. She is amazing at any genre..

name: Shirl H
text: I like mellow mushroom. But the quality of the pizza here was depressing. Probably bc it is situated at a touristic location. We were 5 people and only ate 3/8 slices 😬. We also ordered a cheese clazone and preztle bites. Those were at least ok.

name: Allison Gladkowski
text: Smaller and more relaxed bar. The biggest and best calzones I have ever seen! And the only place on Broadway (that I saw) that had Jack Coke slushies

name: Jeremy Heaton
text: Great pizza! I'm pretty sure it's the antidote for hangovers. The band was super fun and entertaining. The staff were true professionals.  I totally recommend stopping at Mellow Mushroom.

name: Leslie Craven
text: Loooved the pizza and cheese bread!  Our server was amazing! AND .. they were playing Motown.  MOTOWN, in Nashville!  What a pleasant surprise, with us being from the metro-Dertoit area!    The kids loved watching the pizza elevator!  Will visit again!

name: Eilon Morav
text: Vegan friendly. Great live music

name: Cory Kesty
text: Very nice place. 3 story's we sat in the middle bar. Can't wait to go back. Don't go here if you need fast service to get somewhere else in a hurry. Very casual environment. Good music. Pricing is higher than other mellow mushrooms...

name: Novia Jackson
text: This place was amazing, so was the music

name: Kenneth Bruce
text: Interesting pizza selections, had several and so far all have been good. They also have a nice selection of beer. I think the last one we dined in had a selection of 24 available.

name: Karsten Jordan
text:
Great pizza !! Probably the best I found on lower Broadway.
Cold draft beer, great service, clean bathrooms.
Great spot to hang out.

name: Ginni Buongiovanni
text: We had a blast. Will be back. Service was great. Very happy and up beat.

name: randall love
text: 2 dollar slices pepperoni were surprisingly good

name: Justin Seitz
text: Pizza was over cooked. I am a huge fan of Mellow Mushroom but I don't think I'll return to this one. I took my wife and in-laws which had never been , I was bragging about how amazing the food was. Boy do I look like a fool.

name: Jeremy Waters Enterprises
text: Live cover bands picture #michaelscottband great draft selection's. Happy hour prices & specialty food mostly pizza a share food. A great time!

name: Carol Tally
text: This was our first time at a Mellow Mushroom.  We were in vacation in Nashville and hungry for pizza.  The location was only 2 blocks from where we were and they had a live band playing (as with most places on Broadway).  We ordered a small …More

name: Bubba Mcchicken
text: We had a couple of pizzas and they were all tasty.  The bands were playing some good songs.

name: Kaylani Phillips
text: John Cage is awesome! Vegan pizza also!

name: Christina
text: YUM! Delicious and fresh! We got the medium house special, split between, there's still a few pieces left over. You can tell it's handmade and it's not greasy. Would definitely recommend!

name: Shannon Bender
text: Great rooftop bar and the pizza is always awesome!

name: Larry Franklin
text: Very friendly wait staff and quick service when we had a bus to catch.  Food was excellent and plenty of beverages to select from. Live music was very good and not too loud!

name: Elena Costea
text: Good music, quick service.

name: Haven McBride
text: Good food! Fun atmosphere

name: Bryon Van Brocklin
text: Cheede calzone. Great environment! The tire strip gorilla was absolutely funny! Great service too. Thanks for an awesome time Nashville!

name: Matthew Vickaryous
text: The pizza here is great. You can make them vegan by substituting for the vegan cheese and no butter on the crust. They also have a few meat substitutes like the teriyaki tempeh. The service here was great both times I visited.

name: Janet Patterson
text: Great ambiance with greater waitresses and this appitizer was DELICIOUS

name: scott schrum
text: finally found a place with draft beer. and good music too

name: G
text: They try to get you in with $10 “pitchers” of PBR (barely 20 ounces, so more like a pint). Get snotty when you don’t buy their food. Atmosphere mediocre, service meh, plastic cups... I’d spend the extra couple bucks and head across the street instead. 🤷🏻‍♂️

name: wolf of sheeple
text: Frozen jack and coke is great!

name: Gaby Kotliar
text:
Is not only that you can find here very good draft beer among a lot of places that only serve length draft beer, but also they serve an amazing pizza.
Also the band playing tonight is really, really good

name: Challen Frankart
text: Went with a group of 5 on a Saturday night. Had a bad experience with bartender and server the first visit. Spoke with the manager about experience. Both managers personally took the time to apologize, introduce themselves, and invite us …More

name: Victoria Langenstein
text: Nice service but a little slow. Ordered a garlic cheese bread but it wasnt very basic. Music was great (obviously) and it was nice and cool. Beers cold 😉

name: Nicola Moore
text: Always a go too. Can't go wrong

name: thomas quaranta
text: Nice spot to get some vegitarian grub. Also has cool bands.

name: Scott Mulkey
text: 4th of July Roof Top

name: Richard Meddings
text: Live music every night! Excellent pizza and fantastic staff.

name: Lane Ross
text: I cannot review the food but the drinks were great, the atmosphere was fun and the staff incredibly friendly.  The music was it of this world top notch.  I would recommend a stop at this fine watering hole.

name: Jessica Lopez
text: I'm here in Nashville for a work conference. With so many options around us, we chose this establishment, and I regret my decision. …More

name: Lindsay Hedges
text: Awesome burger and great pizza! We also had the pretzel bites appetizer that tasted phenomenal. They only had one girl running the top floor but the atmosphere was nice. Nice little fire pit up there. I’d come back!

name: Tracy Gabriel
text: We visited on Friday evening and we were took our seats in PJ's section. PJ has a great sense of humor & he is always smiling.  He wins the hat flipping contest over the "Mike's" behind the bar. The band was playing some southern rock and …More

name: Janet Johnson
text: The music was rockin' last night, but the pizza was just okay.

name: Dana VanConant
text: Great pizza and soup!

name: Amanda Lee
text: Great rooftop view. Friendly servers and got food quick considering how busy. Pretzel bites and chicken hoagie is delish.

name: Gloria Londono
text: Great place for pizza and a live band,  my daughters and I enjoyed a nice new year's eve in Mellow Mushroom.

name: Aaron Campbell
text: Outstanding pizza and fantastic music

name: edward scolforo
text:
Fun place, good music.
We sat on the roof level which gave us a good view of the street activities below. The pizza was excellent.

name: Laxmi Srinivas
text: Great band Michael Scott!!! And had a great service with Rebecca!!! ♥️

name: Mateusz Suchecki
text: Best pizza I've ever had!

name: Nolram Martínez
text: Awesome food and live music

name: Dominique Lavault
text: I don't know, less crowded rooftop. Not too straight. If you want to get out of the over engineered sanitized touristic Broadway ?  I wouldn't say it is. I goy had couple of great time there..

name: LATROY KING
text: We loved the pizza and the atmosphere of Mellow Mushroom! We definitely we be back!

name: Cheryl Toler
text: Excellent service, great live music playing,  and drinks with delicious pizza. I wish I could remember my waiters name, he was just awesome and  so friendly.  Made the meal even more enjoyable.

name: Amit Mathur
text: Good pizza , server was amazing,we have close by parking too.

name: Todd Murphy
text: Felt that the prices were high for what we ordered. The roof felt a little disarray I expected it to be nicer up there on the roof.  We won’t go there again.

name: Tami Parent
text: Pizza was delicious!! Staff were great also.

name: Cary Welch
text: Loved the Mexicans awesome band played for the crowd!

name: Garrett Wolff
text: Amazing place..  John Cage was an absolute riot!!!  Pizza was delicious!  Service was great by Rebecca.  Definitely recommended.

name: Lori Wietry
text: love this place wish they would come to Cookeville Tn

name: Jonathan Lorber
text: The pizza was good, but the lady in this picture wasn't using any gloves or utensils to cut and serve the pizza slices, just her hands... Which she was also using to collect money, pour drinks, etc... It was disgusting. The man in the picture was putting on a glove every time he served pizza slices.

name: Terri Vidals
text: In Nashville two nights and went here both nights. Went back the second evening for the mushroom pizza! Sat on second level the first evening. You can enjoy your food and the music which plays on the lower level. Sat on the roof top second …More

name: Amber Mueller
text: Live music and pizza always good. Service was slow but with entertainment who cares.

name: Doug Gorges
text: Came to Nashville for a weekend of fun with some friends. We stopped by mellow mushroom and were thoroughly impressed with the food and service. Rebecca was kind and courteous. Will be coming back tonight for a late night snack!

name: Jace Wolford
text: Delicious pizza, "the usual ". Great band and service

name: John Morris
text: The usual excellent food typical of a Mellow Mushroom. Service was great (thank you Anna) and the live music fun.  We are talking Nashville.

name: Tim Cartwright
text:
I was there Saturday night and it was awesome
From the security guy at the door dancing and inviting us in
To the amazing service we had from our server late night. The music was awesome …More

name: Chris Steinke
text: Best pizza I've ever had

name: Amanda Landis
text: Absolutely fantastic!!

name: Rick Wood
text: Another great place for food, music and fun. The pizza is absolutely delicious and popular. You can buy it by the slice or a whole pizza, but you better get in line first. They go fast. You won't be disappointed.

name: Jay Gonzales Sr
text: Really good pizza and spinach artichoke dip. Great live music

name: Melanie Reeves
text: I love Mellow Mushroom. I have been to quite a few across the country however tonight this one on Broadway in Nashville was by far the worst. Between the live music and the slice only pizza, well it was terrible.

name: Jeff Calvert
text: Fun, bar/restaurant in the heart of broadway.  Multiple levels including roof top bar and live music.  Food and service were both good.

name: Vytautas Grigaliunas
text: Wonderful place with live music. Jack Daniels & Coke slush was delicious!

name: Amanda Stewart
text: Food was delicious, great live music. Rebecca took excellent care of us. Will definitely be back.

name: amber prichard
text: Fantastic entertainment! The talents do not mention their names as much as they should, but whoever played Sunday night (9/29) is five stars!

name: Tony Virili
text: The deluxe burger was top notch. Friendly staff and plenty of great entertainment. Looking forward to checking it out at night.

name: Tim james
text: Food and atmosphere was great. Band AG3 was really good!

name: Aimee W.
text: The mellow mushroom that was once in Maryland sadly shut down and this was a pleasant surprise to find during my road trip. Like other restaurants and bars in the area oh, there is live music in addition to delicious food. There are great …More

name: Ashli Allen
text: Delicious food and excellent vegan options.

name: Denis Shelston
text: Roof top lunch with friends. Quick and efficient wait staff. Pizza Veg Out was fresh and delicious.  Burger was great. Highly recommended.

name: Simon Frampton
text: Range of craft beers, good beer, good burgers and reasonable prices. Great music too.

name: ML K
text: Very friendly staff and the pizza was excellent.  We went around 4 PM, they had a band playing and it wasn't that crowded

name: Chris Copper
text: Place hit the spot, different levels of good atmosphere

name: Steve Pierce
text: Great music

name: Gusto Overland
text: Nice place, good beer, live music and the boss is nice and friendly. Yee haw!!

name: SagarHenna Shah
text: Rebecca was amazing!! The food is delicious, the singers are wonderful, and the ambiance is incredible. Rebecca recommended fun spots for us to visit, as it was our first time in Nashville. She was so kind and fun. 10/10 would recommend.

name: Claire Delgadillo
text: Staff was nice enough, but there was 1 bathroom stall open in the entire restaurant (and it was dirty), and the pizza was so soggy it nearly fell apart as soon as you picked it up. Very overpriced for the quality, even with being on Broadway.

name: John Kim
text: Came in on a night where the band was playing 90's grunge, 90's alternative, heavy metal, and country...and it was all good. The vibe at this place is cool and comfortable. The pizza is stellar, if you like thin crust like NYC Pizza. Only …More

name: Gladys Loor
text: Good food

name: Gina Chambers
text: Mellow mushroom was the best! Pizza, beer and a great live band. I'll go back every time I'm in Nashville.

name: Tayler Loomis
text: We went into the Mellow Mushroom late at night... Warning it was hot and busy! The servers were on a mission but not very friendly - they were serving the to go window more than the tables.

name: LaToya M
text: Great pizza during our visit to Nashville!

name: Lisa Burek
text: Ok food. Got calzones, a bit greasy. Drinks were ok for the price

name: Suzette Binek
text: Great atmosphere 🍻 food and service very good. Fantastic band, played all music, mostly country👏

name: Rac Pz
text: Good pizza. Great music.

name: D B
text: The pizza is nothing to write home about. But the atmosphere is nice and reasonably priced. The staff is friendly and attentive.

name: Sylvia Bittles
text: Fun time.  Talented musicians.  Great bar service.  Pizza was the staple.  Gluten Free pizza was good enough.

name: Tammy Bonnette
text: Best prices around downtown! Great music! Very friendly staff!

name: Nicole McIntyre
text: This place had some decent pizza for it not being in Chicago. The building itself was kinda cool, bc there were like 4 or 5 different floors where there were bars, so you could eat and drink on every floor. The staff was very nice as well.

name: TryBrs
text: Fun place.

name: Vaughn Skow
text: Not cool these days.  Just a loud tourist bar ... NOT a place to actually eat pizza :-(

name: Jerry Leach
text: Great pizzas and the band was great that night

name: Robert Kerlin
text: Pizza by the slice but only pepperoni and grease for toppings. Music was insanely loud for no reason and the band obnoxiously kept asking for 100$ song requests. Beer and alcohol is overpriced and they have gone out if their way to have the …More

name: melissa tahbo
text: Great food, great music and great service!

name: Colin Underwood
text: Great food. Loved the music. The steak and cheese was a refreshing change of style.

name: Karen Finnegan
text: Good prices ($5 for a local draft);  singer/band had fun personality; not as crowded as some of the other places.  I liked it!

name: Michelle Curtin
text: Mellow mushroom NEVER disappoints!!

name: Chris Bowersox
text: The pizza here is very above average. I left very satisfied with my meal. Be forewarned, the Broadway location means that loud live music will provide the soundtrack to your meal, and the staff isn’t exactly the most warm, patient, and …More

name: Mike MacDonald
text: Ggod food, service and comfortable atmosphere

name: jeremy swilley
text: I love their pizza... House special baby!

name: David Noll
text: Food and atmosphere are fantastic.  We arrived on Friday March 8th at about 6:00pm.  The 6 man band in stage at that time was Awesome!  However, the 4 men that followed were a complete let down! I'd say get there early because the talent really dropped off later at night.

name: c c
text: Cozy little restaurant and bar. Good drinks and although I didn't eat anything, the pizza looked great!

name: wherebart at
text: Ok but Ive had much better mellow mushroom

name: Danielle Hall
text: Music was extremely to loud, yes I know this is music City and live music is the thing to have but we ended up on the 2nd floor and still could hardly hear the waitress when she came to take our order. The food was very good but I ordered a …More

name: D L
text: Owner does not care about the safety of his customers. Only care about the money. DO NOT DO BUSINESS HERE!

name: Barbara Blagaich
text: After a straight 13 Hour drive  from Toronto Canada to Nashville TN on Sun Sept 15/2019.  We hit the Streets of downtown Nashville and had a blast visiting a few gift shops and several bars. When we walked into the Mellow Mushroom and sat …More

name: Clayton Gabriel Floyd
text: really good pizza and really good live music here and the service is really good

name: Maria Cayo
text: Good food and service

name: Griffin Han-Lalime
text: Fan-TAStic pizza! The sauce is particularly delicious. Great service and drinks to top it off. Be warned, the live bands are pretty loud, but that's not necessarily a bad thing 🎸

name: Werner Jakobsen
text: Pop'd in for a lunchbite. Had a calzone with chicken, recomend! With nice live music by Grace&Mike

name: Leovel Diaz
text: AWESOME SERVICE FROM START TO END.

name: Brad W
text:
We only did drinks but the service was amazing. Waitress was wonderful her name was Lelia l (?) I believe,
she was great! …More

name: Hillary S
text: Good pizza, beer and live music!

name: Peggy Foster
text: The best pizza and staff plus bonus music!! Love Tennessee

name: Anthony Fritch
text: PJ very helpful great view oh and my beautiful wife

name: Kathy Scott
text: Awesome. Great pizza!

name: Brady Houkom
text: Got the pizza here and watched a band. The pizza was very good! The service was awesome too. All around a good experience.

name: Mark Miller
text: Loved the atmosphere, small local band in cozy setting, great place to start your evening in Nashville

name: Jessica Boatright
text: Obnoxiously loud and terrible music.  Food was gross and also not even what I ordered. Will not go back. Would not recommend.

name: lonnie cross
text: Great grub and friendly service.

name: Matthew Wade
text: Great music

name: Judy
text: Great band.  Stop in for some great music and drinks.

name: Joell Smith-Borne
text: Maybe no one else wandering on Broadway would want a salad, but if you happen to, don't get it here. I got the build-your-own, which is described as base + 3 for $7.99, so I only added 3 veggies and dressing, skipped the cheese. When I got …More

name: jc pasillas
text: Great family place with live music

name: Bobby
text: Love the location right smacknin the middle of lower Broadway, the historic building just oozes with personality only to be outdone by the personality of the staff! The food is out of this world served hot and fresh and with a smile.

name: Rachel Hurst
text: Great pizza!

name: Lenny Schebil
text: Love this place.. great selection of beers and great food.. wait staff was awesome

name: Rob Young
text: Waitress has great attitude and tool great care of us.

name: Genevieve Wilson
text: Awesome service, great food. Slices sold at the bar till they run out. Best place to eat and watch football on Sundays.

name: Ellen Miller
text: Had a great time, the live entertainment  awesome.

name: john binek
text: Great pizza and band last night ! It was a great start to my Nashville vacation !

name: Greg Katterhagen
text: Had a great sandwich between bands.

name: Terrence Ford
text: From what my buddy said it was the best pizza in Nashville I didn't get to eat it because he snuck and ate my piece so it must be really good

name: Paige Marie
text: Veggie calzone was super tasty!!! The staff is great! Very friendly & lively! Absolutely loved it! The roof top had a beautiful & cool view! And it wasn't as packed as the other bars' rooftops so im glad I stopped in!!

name: Kay
text:
Great pizza and drinks!! Great service and our pizza came out in 20 mins
🙌❤

name: Florencia Basaldella
text: The pizza here it's delicious and the staff is very friendly. The band was really good.

name: Victoria Brinkman
text: Good pizza & wings. great band playing r&b.

name: Vik M.
text: 5 dollar pizzas.. geez. First time I've had a slice for $5. Some places in Nashville are more expensive than Vegas and NY combined.

name: Ruth Arnell
text: The shitake mushroom pizza was fantastic. The bartender was attentive without being obsequious. The only drawback is that everyone wants to come here, so finding a seat can be difficult.

name: Ruthann Mink
text: Really nice spot with live music. The food was very good, the wait staff were pretty slow though. Don't be surprised to have a long wait.

name: David Berke
text: To start with, the bartender from Detroit, she was totally delightful and very welcoming. Reason enough to come back. I had a calzone which was really good and they helped me actually get real silverware to a point so I could actually cut …More

name: Jessica P
text: They have vegan cheese! Great pizzas. Been here twice. Service was pretty rude the first time but it was around bar closing time so that's understandable. Second time the service was great. Excellent pizza choices. …More

name: Diana Germain
text: Food..wonderful as always..the Band was terrific!!!! What a great time in Nashville..downtown!

name: Beverly King
text: First time in Nashville. Mellow mushroom was my favorite by far! Great band playing, friendly bar staff, server was on it!! Big Pappa at the door is super nice and welcomed us in each time we came in. Pizza was a great way to end the night!

name: Sean Higgins
text: A cool little bar...bands playing and decent pizza..good place for a slice and a drink before a show at Bridgestone!

name: Tiffany R
text: The food was alright as well as the service. There's definitely better food in the area than this.

name: Paul Iford
text: The Pizza was definitely the highlight, the view from the rooftop bar was one of the best my group went to.

name: Laura Remy
text: The pizza was amazing, but the service was HORRIBLE. At one point we asked for an extra condiment and the bartender said “I’ll get it for you, eventually” but she never did. We had to specifically ask that the channel be turned to SNF when …More

name: Jesse Robertson
text: Great pizza, great beer selection and great live country music; what else could you want in Nashville?!

name: Kim Martin
text: This place had the most amazing bar tenders that really knew how to mix the drinks and we all know that is high on the priority list! The band was very good and we had a great time here!

name: C Byrd
text: Went on a Sunday night, which allows kids.  Our table was upstairs. Drunks everywhere.  The place was packed and they had one server handling the bar and all tables. She did very well considering the circumstances. Food was good. If you're …More

name: Dan Stocks
text: Terrific spot amongst the many...many.......many bars on the strip in Nashville.....only picked this one because we have a really good Mellow Mushroom Pizza down at Chattanooga...this was great too!!!...and with terrific talent belting out tunes....

name: Jennifer bradshaw

text: At 1 a.m. I want a big slice of pepperoni pizza. They have it!

name: Mike Dickens

name: Brandon M
text: Great band, packed space but a great bar all in all.

name: Steve Begley
text: Good atmosphere live music.  Pizza was delicious.

name: Mindy Covin
text: I really like Mellow Mushroom, but this one does not live up to it's name. They are just churning out food for tourists. Guess you  gotta make a living. The salad was good, but our pizza order (one of their signature pizzas) was wrong.

name: John Toon
text: Great food, beer, music and service

name: Wendy Starr
text: The pizza was good and pretzel bites were good.  The service was very slow.  Watched two tables get tired of waiting and left.  Our server was nice, but not very energetic.  You may want to sit on the first floor.  We were told the elevator for the food was caused delay.

name: Lacie Davidson
text: Thank goodness they serve pizza late! We ate there 2 nights in a row! Really good pizza by the slice!

name: Stacia Rains
text: Great music!  Drinks are cold. People fun!

name: John Janasiewicz
text: If I could leave 0 stars, I would. $5 a slice for left over, barely reheated pizza? Unbelievable.

name: Cody Funderbürg

name: Michelle Pucci

text: This guy approached us he said come in try the pizza you'll love it right away being from Chicago we were like yeah right but what the hell we tried it and were pleasantly surprised on top of that the entertainment was awesome had a great time this bar is a must see i will definitely stop in next time i go to Nashville

text: Good for a small meal and great music. I like the space in front of the stage to dance. But we had to wait a long time for even just our sandwiches. The hummus came out frozes and was thrown away from the waitress as we asked to warm it up in the microwave for us.
